name: Water Slide Adventure VR
description:
Welcome to the world of VR games! Indulge in the thrilling experience of a free fall water slide ride in virtual reality. Enjoy all the thrills & entertainment of a VR water park in this aqua fun game on your mobile without leaving the comfort of your home.
Do you love top trending games? Are you a true Adventure Lover? Water Slide Adventure VR is the next a top trending wild VR water park adventure game for true adventure lovers! Talk about making a big splash: Try out the VR water slide crazy roller coaster of crazy twists and turns with the most amazing physics based movements in the 1st person based 3D water slide VR game. Twist & tilt your way round tight corners, make loops and whizz through at lightning speeds! Collect coins, speed boosters and other amazing surprises. Be sure to avoid the dangerous objects on your way down. Be careful around the edges as you can reach the speed of up to 60 miles per hour as you plummet down the tallest thrill ride in free-fall water slider.
THE MOST THRILLING RIDE FIRST TIME IN VR!
Prepare yourself for a mind-blowing VR park enjoyment for the most immersive &indulging VR water slide experience. Feel and live through the excitement of riding on a magical joyride in crazy coaster VR Water Park. Enjoy realistic splashing water effects as you slide down the tallest free fall thrill ride.
ENJOY SLIDING DOWN THE TALLEST WATER SLIDE
Do you have a fear of heights? This tallest and fastest Water Slide is the stuff for nightmares! Enjoy the extreme roller coaster of madness that is going to blow your mind away with amazing drops & thrilling bird’s eye view of the entire city with highly immersive & impressive 3D graphics in this VR game. Feel the fear in 5 different levels of 3D Water Slide VR game.
INCREDIBLE GRAPHICS & VISUALS
This wonderfully crafted game, VR Water Park Slide, offers you a great immersive experience of extreme aqua games in a VR world. This game is a crazy VR water slide simulator that offers high quality graphics, 3D HD environment, colorful surroundings and amazing effects. Enjoy the amazing twists & turns of VR water slide in 360 degree view. This aqua fun game has a lot of features &racing adventures to unlock with beautiful city buildings in game environment.
EASY & INTUITIVE CONTROLS
Twist & tilt your way by sliding freely in the VR water world; the highly responsive controls in 3d water slide game are worth giving a shot!
FREE WATER SLIDE SIMULATOR
Built to mimic the experience of sliding down a giant, thrilling water slide, the Water Slide Adventure VR game is a perfect simulator to sit back & enjoy! You may have enjoyed uphill rush games, water park games, theme park games, fantasy games, water slide games & roller coaster games in 3D. Now it’s time to enjoy the real thrill in VR water slide game. Download VR water slide game to begin the limitless fun in VR.
HOW TO PLAY:
- You should have gyroscope in smart phone to enjoy this VR simulator
- Slide your device into the VR glasses
- Experience the real VR water slide adventure physics through VR glasses
- Tilt mobile from left to right to collect coins
- Watch out for the edges if you don’t wish to fall
SUPER FUN VR WATER SLIDE FEATURES
- High quality, immersive visuals
- Extreme water park thrills with 3D water slider
- Easy to download and user friendly
- Superb first person controls
- Amazing environments to explore!
- Fastest roller coaster ride of twists and turns
- Exhilarating physics guaranteed to give you an adrenaline rush!
- Play anytime, anywhere, no wi-fi needed!
VR Water Slide Adventure is compatible with 4DUD VR Glasses, Google Cardboard, Durovis Dive, Vrase, Samsung Gear VR, Carl Zeiss VR one, Archos / Colorcross and other DIY Oculus Rift, HTC Vive or Microsoft Hololens etc.
We don't collect any personal information , any non-personal information collected by our partners like Google is used for analytic and game improvements. For details check here
